meanings.sent1: She always wears elegant coiffures to special events.
meanings.sent2: Her coiffures are always neat and stylish.
meanings.sent3: The clown's coiffures were so wild that they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her coiffures were like a crown of beauty on her head.
meanings.sent5: The bride's coiffures on her wedding day were absolutely stunning.

meanings.definition: To style or arrange hair in a particular way
meanings.sent1: She coiffures her hair differently every day.
meanings.sent2: He coiffures his hair before going out.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed confused when she tried to coiffure its fur.
meanings.sent4: She coiffures her hair with care and precision.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylist coiffures her clients' hair beautifully.
